metadata.title: Alberta Homestead Records 1870-1940 [Reel 70.313/2880]
metadata.creator: Canada. Dominion Lands Branch
metadata.subject: Frontier and pioneer life—Alberta
Alberta—History
metadata.description: These microfilm reels contain the documents related to Alberta homestead claims filed between 1870 and 1930. Homestead files normally contain an application for homestead, an application for patent, and a notice that patent has been issued. They may also contain other documents such as inspector’s reports, records of abandonment, handwritten letters, wills, naturalization certificates, scrip, seed grain liens, court, proceedings, etc. (from Alberta Genealogical Society Index to Alberta Homestead Records 1870 to 1930)
metadata.notes: Film/Fiche is presented as originally captured.
metadata.subject: genealogy
